caption: (a)
description: This figure shows an Android application demonstrating SlimLM's capabilities for document assistance.  The app allows users to load a document (such as a legal contract), receive a generated summary, suggest questions related to the document, and then obtain answers. This all happens on the device itself, without needing an internet connection, reducing server costs and privacy concerns.

caption: (b)
description: This figure displays an Android application demonstrating SlimLM's document assistance capabilities.  The application allows users to load a document (in this case, a research paper), obtain a concise summary, generate relevant questions about the document, and receive accurate answers directly on the device without needing an internet connection.  The application highlights the key benefits of SlimLM, including reduced server costs, enhanced user privacy, and efficient on-device document processing.
